name: Prophetical Chapter One
description:
Prophetical - Chapter Game

Your a Pilot training on your new ship when an unknown alien race (as well as annoying pirates) attack you. As the only ship in the area you must defend the dry dock until reinforcements arrive. Suddenly a strange event happens in the area and as more aliens flood in from a strange anomaly you must fight wave after wave until you die or they do. Once you have completed all of your objectives you are ordered to pursue a pirate ship which attempted a raid of one of your cargo ships earlier on who is heading towards Mercury, chapter two resumes from there but what will happen?

feedback and comments gained from peoples experience will set the game in stone and will be put in place for chapter two.
